dialogue.text: Oh, hey. What’s up?
You looking for somebody?
Yes. Her name is Otoha Okakura. Have you seen her anywhere?
Cool name. Sounds like she’d be a really good singer.
Want to look for her together?
No need. I’m pretty sure I just found her.
What? Where?
Right in front of me...
Aww, shucks. You know what? Now that you mention it, that {i}is{/i} me.
What do you need with {i}me{/i}, though? I didn’t like...break any rules or anything, did I?
Rules? I’m not even sure if these dorms have rules.
And if they do, I’m definitely not the person you should be asking about them.
I just came over to see how you were doing.
I’m great. But like, what do you mean there aren’t any rules?
We’re [teenage]girls living in a dorm room without a permanent supervisor. Surely there have to be like...{i}some{/i} rules?
Just make up your own rules if you want them so much.
I don’t {i}want{/i} them but like...it’s just weird that there {i}aren’t{/i} any.
Like, what if I wanted to play my keyboard really loud at 2:00 AM. Wouldn’t I get in trouble?
Probably not. But I can’t imagine Nodoka or any of the other girls would like you very much after that.
I’m pretty sure Nodoka doesn’t sleep, so she’d be fine with it.
And it’s not like I’d do something like that anyway. I need peace and quiet after a certain point of the night or I just...can’t get anything done.
This definitely isn’t me saying I want to go back or anything, but one of the things I liked about staying with my parents was that it was always quiet as soon as dinner was over.
So I’d get to just...sit around and write whatever came to my mind.
Here, it’s like...the complete opposite.
I'm also literally {i}right{/i} next to Molly’s room and I’m pretty sure her volume knob is busted.
I’m pretty sure most of her is busted.
I can hear you two, you know?!
Hey, Molly! If it makes you feel better, I think your Japanese is really good!
And you like, barely even have an accent, so...good job!
I will...forgive these transgressions for now!
But please wait until I am out of range if you’re going to use vicious mockery on me!
I don’t know what that is, but okay!
At least you seem to be getting along well.
I’m like, weirdly good at making friends.
I’ve gotten along with basically everybody here so far.
Are you sure that's not just everyone having a crush on you by now?
Oh God, I hope not. I have no idea how I’d go about rejecting so many people at once.
Should I like, send out a newsletter or something?
Yes. That is absolutely something you should do. I’ll give you my email address so you can copy me on it as well.
Don’t tell me {i}you{/i} have a crush on me, too...
Absolutely not. I have never once even thought of you that way.
Rin would kill me if I ever dated you anyway. So, yeah. Sorry but...
Actually, just wait for the newsletter. That will explain everything.
I’m pretty sure Rin would be a little more upset about you not dating {i}her{/i} than dating me, so she definitely won’t kill you.
I don’t know about that, Sensei.
I know I’ve only seen you two together a handful of times but...she’s different with you than she is with anybody else. Myself included.
You know what? It probably wouldn’t be smart to carry on this conversation with Molly standing right behind us, so...
She started playing something on her phone, so I’m sure she’s not paying much attention.
But yeah, I agree. I feel weird talking about people when they’re not around anyway.
Any suggestions for a new topic then?
Hmm...how about you tell me why you're suddenly so interested in {i}how I’m doing?{/i}
You’re not worried about me feeling homesick or something, are you?
No, but...are you?
I’m not.
I...think I like it here.
I had no idea that living with people similar to me could be so...exhilarating.
And even if it gets loud and I have a hard time focusing on my work...it’s fun.
Like there’s always some sort of...mystery behind every door.
There is a mystery behind every door. Sometimes even more than one.
Just make sure you knock on them before entering if you want to avoid ever walking in on something weird.
Like what?
Every third Saturday of the month, if you wait until approximately 3:00 AM and very quietly walk into any of the dorms on the first floor, you will find that room's inhabitants sacrificing a lamb.
This[school] is...weird.
Very much so. But you must be weird too since you’re a part of it now.
Pfft. Maybe so. No one’s perfect after all.
I just hope you don’t lose sight of me amidst all the huge personalities on this floor.
Wait a minute...You {i}want{/i} me to be worried about you, don’t you?
Hey, there are no rules up here. I need {i}someone{/i} to worry in case anyone tries to kidnap me in the middle of the night or something.
I’m glad we never went with Plan B because that would have already happened by now.
Wait, what?
Later, Otoha. It was nice talking to you.
Hold on! What was Plan B?!
And...what was Plan A?!
What were you going to do to me?!
Enjoy the rest of your night. Hopefully no one comes to kidnap you.
Sensei! This is making me feel really weird!
{i}Otoha’s affection has increased to [otoha_love]!{/i}
